title: add TestCoreParser.testTermQueryEmptyXML test
description:
Test that parsing of <TermQuery fieldName="contents"></TermQuery> fails.
	Add a parseShouldFail helper method to TestCoreParser which deriving classes can use to test that parsing of other more complex queries also fails as expected.
